message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI. 

This paper is about training an automatic article commenting model using unpaired articles and comments. The proposed model is based on a retrieval-based commenting framework and uses a neural variational topic model to obtain topic representations in an unsupervised manner. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves training a machine learning model, which suggests the sub-categories cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
